short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and use thousands of nearby printers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need to print something but don’t have a printer?

NeverPrinter connects you with thousands of printers in nearby stores. So, you can print and pickup. Or, have your prints delivered.

Using NeverPrinter is as easy as printing with an ordinary home printer. Bring up the Chrome print dialog and select NeverPrinter for the destination.

Then choose a nearby store from more than 9,000 printer locations, including FedEx Office, Staples, Office Depot, OfficeMax, The UPS Store, and others.

NeverPrinter is free and you can use it without providing any personal information.

Some benefits of using NeverPrinter versus buying your own printer:
👍 No ink cartridges or printer connectivity issues
👍 No up-front investment in printer hardware
👍 Doesn't take up desk space in your home office
👍 Better quality prints than a cheap home printer
👍 No electronic waste from a disposal of a home printer

By adding this extension, you agree to and acknowledge:

https://neverprinter.com/conditions

https://neverprinter.com/privacy
